channel.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
channel.description:
I had this idea a couple days ago, and to my surprise I actually went through with it and [b]YES[/b] I actually finished something.
The objective is basically to be the last one alive. You get spawned in the middle, and you try to get to the chests for some supplies, and hopefully you'll make it out alive. There is a tent spawned at a random location with crates in them that can only be used by [b]1[/b] player, once per game, for a powerful item, like barrows, barrage runes, or gwd armor.
[ul][li]I am aware that my inventory items or equipment didn't appear to be deleted. They actually were, my inventory just didn't update[/li] [li]I am aware that the hunger games movie isn't exactly like this.[/li] [li]I am sorry about the video being so small, it was a dumb idea to get 2 clients in the same shot[/li] [li]I am aware that the bushes on the edge of the map are fairly ugly. Suggest something better[/li][/ul]
Any criticism and feedback is welcomed as long as it's not stupid or flaming in anyway.
[size=14pt][b]I HIGHLY SUGGEST YOU WATCH IN FULLSCREEN[/b][/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSF-u-rqyIg&feature=c4-overview&list=UUmm_25tOs3XDYhHsCVBbVJQ[/youtube]

item.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:18, topic:524812”]do the chests take account of the accessing player’s stats?

like, what if a level 10 joined with a level 85; would the lower level have a chance to get barrows/whips?

or possibly, you could remove all item requirements inside the minigame; so the bonuses are still effective - and it would rely more on skill levels and not ‘luck’ at the chests.[/quote]

I didn’t think of that actually.

I think i’ll remove all item requirements when inside the minigame.

Read full topic
item.source: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

do the chests take account of the accessing player’s stats?

like, what if a level 10 joined with a level 85; would the lower level have a chance to get barrows/whips?

or possibly, you could remove all item requirements inside the minigame; so the bonuses are still effective - and it would rely more on skill levels and not ‘luck’ at the chests.

item.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

asshole_rule:

I have a player limit atm, and it’s at 8.

Oh, alright. Then your all good to go.

Read full topic
item.source: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame

item.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Spades:

Good concept, I am interested in what this will lead to be.

[quote=“arham 4, post:15, topic:524812”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643498.msg4331469#msg4331469 date=1373690764]

Meh, it has severe limitations.

That really depends on how you want to use it. I know of the size limitation, and I don’t want a huge map anyways, the size is perfect imo.

What other limitations are there?
[/quote]
To limit possible ones, I suggest you make a Max player limit. 15 players or so in this minigame can kill its fun.

But I love it so far man. Keep up the nice work and I’m sure this’ll be something amazing.[/quote]

Thanks.

I have a player limit atm, and it’s at 8.

Read full topic
item.source: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame

item.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:13, topic:524812”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=643498.msg4331456#msg4331456 date=1373689522]
Meh, it has severe limitations.
[/quote]

That really depends on how you want to use it. I know of the size limitation, and I don’t want a huge map anyways, the size is perfect imo.

What other limitations are there?[/quote]
To limit possible ones, I suggest you make a Max player limit. 15 players or so in this minigame can kill its fun.

But I love it so far man. Keep up the nice work and I’m sure this’ll be something amazing.

Try generating the borders using some randomly positioned trees so it’s not flat

I mean generate trees beyond the border, too, btw

item.source: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame

item.title: Random Map Generating and Hunger Games Minigame
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:5, topic:524812”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643498.msg4331406#msg4331406 date=1373685784]

Very nice job. Is this using the Construct Region packet? Maybe for the corners you could use rocks and trees (dont make them square, though)

Thanks, and yes it is. It’s sooo useful.

What I could do is put water out there, but I don’t like the whole idea of having a square island.
[/quote]
Why not just tightly-packed rocks and trees?[/quote]

doesn’t look much better imo.

Read full topic
